loans.name: Mona

texts.en:
Mona is a 55-year-old widowed mother of four. Four years ago, she started selling clothes to cover the needs and expenses of her family. She is her family's only breadwinner, and she is a sacrificing mother who deprives herself for the sake of her children.

Mona is well-known in her region and has a good reputation for her good communication skills.

Today, Mona is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to travel and visit holy places, which she always dreamed about.

Mona hopes to expand her business more in the future to increase her income and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to achieve her dream by traveling and visiting holy places.

loans.name: Vilma Estela

texts.es: Vilma de 46 años de edad que habita en vivienda propia junto a su esposo y su hija de 15 años de edad. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que se gana la vida vendiendo tortillas y pupusas en su pequeño negocio que con mucho esfuerzo ha salido adelante, es así como genera sus ingresos económicos con los que ha sacado adelante a su hija brindando lo necesario para su desarrollo además de proporcionar el alimento y demás gastos del hogar en los que el esposo le ayuda con un pequeño aporte. Vilma desea invertir en la compra de más productos para la elaboración de pupusas y tortillas lo que le permitiría brindarles nuevas variedades de pupusas a sus numerosos clientes, es por eso que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: la compra de una mayor cantidad de maíz, frijol, especias, queso, verduras, etc., para la elaboración de mayor cantidad de pupusas y tortillas para suplir con las exigencias de sus clientes.
texts.en: Vilma, 46 years old, lives in her own house with her husband and her 15-year-old daughter. She is a hard-working woman who earns her living selling tortillas and pupusas in her small business which, with a lot of effort, she has gotten ahead. It is in this way that she generates her income with which she has gotten her daughter ahead, offering the necessary things for her development in addition to providing food and other household expenses with which her husband helps her with a small contribution. Vilma wants to invest in the purchase of more products to make her pupusas and tortillas, which will allow her to offer new varieties of pupusas to her many customers, so she asks FUSAI for a loan to invest in the purchase of a greater quantity of corn, beans, spices, cheese, vegetables, etc. to make a greater quantity of pupusas and tortillas to meet her customers' demand.

loans.use: to invest in purchasing a larger quantity of corn, beans, spices, cheese, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Tites Theresa

texts.en:
Tites Theresa is 33 years old and a single woman. Tites Theresa works very hard to provide for her needs.

Tites Theresa runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for thre years and sells a variety of items.

Tites Theresa requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like beverages, canned goods, snack foods, home care products, and other groceries.

In the future, Tites Theresa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like beverages, canned goods, snack foods, home care products, and other groceries.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina is 48 years old, married, and has one child, who is currently in school.

Marcelina is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. She has been raising livestock for five years now and has borrowed 17 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Marcelina requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock.

Marcelina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Nazia

texts.en:
Nazia is a 37-year-old active borrower of BRAC Pakistan. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is a mother of three sons and her husband has been doing a scrap recycling business for the past 28 years.

Nazia's husband needs to buy scrap material in bulk to recycle, but due to some financial constraints, her husband is not in a suitable position to buy the scrape in bulk. Therefore, Nazia has applied for a Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. This loan amount will enable her husband to purchase the scrap material in bulk so that he can easily adopt the recycling procedure and earn profitable income from his business.

Nazia is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan for this financial assistance.

loans.use: to increase her husband's scrap recycling business.

loans.name: Alba Luz

texts.es:
Alba es una mujer de 58 años de edad que se dedica a la venta de mercancía de productos de belleza, tiene dos hijas y es felizmente casada.
Inicio su negocio en el año 2012 en el afán para generar mayores ingresos para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
Para Alba el mayor logró que ha obtenido con su profesión es el hecho de poder contar con recursos propios para satisfacer sus necesidad y comprar lo que haga falta en el hogar y quiere seguir trabajando para que esta situación siga mejorando.
Actualmente la cliente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mercancía, productos de belleza y mercancía de accesorios, el objetivo principal es abastecerse para atender la demanda de fin de año.
texts.en:
Alba, 58, works selling beauty products. She has two daughters and is happily married. She started her business in 2012, motivated to generate more income so she could improve her family's quality of life.

For Alba, the greatest accomplishment in her work has been to earn her own income to meet her own needs, and to buy whatever is needed for the home. She wants to keep on working and improving on these results.

The client is now applying for a loan to buy goods, beauty products and accessories. The main objective is to stock up in order to meet the year-end demand.

loans.use: to buy goods, beauty products and accessories with the objective of stocking up to meet year-end demand.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.en:
Patricia is 36 years old. She is married to Osike, who is a businessman, and they are blessed with three children who are 21, 16 and 12 years old.

She has had a salon business for five years, currently earning a monthly income of KES 35,000.

She has borrowed KES 60,000 from Vision Fund Kenya as her fourth loan, after paying the previous loans successfully.

She will be using the loan to purchase salon facilities. She hopes that the anticipated profit will help her buy food for the family, pay school fees for her children, pay for medical care, save in her personal savings account, expand her current business and repay her loan too.

Her hopes and dreams for the future are to have a well-established salon and beauty businesses and to enjoy a better live with her family.

loans.use: to purchase salon facilities.

loans.name: Luzvisminda

texts.en:
Luzvisminda is 56 years old and married with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She has a general store business in the Philippines and has been in this business for nine years.

Luzminda requested a PHP 18,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more groceries, like canned goods, noodles, sugar and other groceries.

In the future, Luzminda would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries, like canned goods, noodles, sugar and other groceries.

loans.name: Lesmy Yaneth

texts.es:
Lesmy es una comerciante de 42 años de edad que se dedica a la venta de ropa puerta a puerta, no tiene un local propio, viaja con maletas ofreciendo sus productos en casas de familia y almacenes.
La cliente tiene un hijo pro el cual luchar, por el cual trabajar, es su fuente de inspiración y hará todo lo posible para salir adelante y brindarle un excelente futuro.
Lesmy solicita un préstamo para abastecerse de surtido de ropa, viajara a la ciudad de barranquila donde compra toda la ropa.
texts.en:
Lesmy is a 42 year old merchant who works selling clothing door-to-door. She does not have her own store. She travels with suitcases offering her products in the homes of relatives and to stores.

She has a son and is fighting and working because of him. He is her inspiration and she will do everything possible to bring him up and give him an excellent future.

Lesmy is asking for a loan in order to stock a supply of clothing. She will travel to the city of Barranquilla to buy all the clothing.

loans.use: to stock up on clothing for men and women so she can attend to her customers during the New Year season.

loans.name: Laura Andrea

texts.es:
Laura es una madre cabeza de familia de 22 años de edad que pro la necesidades de generar recursos para alimentar a su hijo, inicio un negocio de venta de mercancía por catálogo.
Ella vive en casa de sus padres, con su trabajo ayuda en los gastos y cubre todas las necesidades de su hijo de 2 años de edad.
Buscando mejorar sus ingresos para darle a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida, la joven solicita un préstamo para comprar surtido de calzado, accesorios, productos de belleza y pijamas para aprovechar de la mejor manera la temporada de fin de año.
texts.en:
Laura is the female head of household, 22 years old, who from the necessity of generating resources to feed her child, began a business selling catalog merchandise.

She lives in her parents' house, with her work she helps with the expenses and covers all the needs of her 2-year-old child.

Seeking to increase her income to give her child a better quality of life, the young woman asks for a loan to purchase an assortment of shoes, accessories, beauty products and pajamas to take the best advantage of the end of the year season.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of shoes, accessories, beauty products and pajamas for the end of the year season.

loans.name: Manuel Dimas

texts.es:
Manuel es un hombre soltero de 46 años de edad, el cual se desempeña como productor agropecuario, con su actividad genera el sustento para su familia y en especial a sus dos hijos.
La producción de leche es una actividad que ha estado en decadencia, el bajo precio de venta de leche ha acabado con muchos productores y Manuel no quiere ser uno de ellos.
Por esta razón solicita un préstamo para comprar una vaca para aumentar su producción y comprar cerdos para tener una actividad complementaria para generar recursos.
texts.en:
Manuel is a single man, 46 years old, who works as an agricultural producer, with his work he generates the sustenance for his family, especially his two children.

Milk production is a business that has been declining, the low sales price of milk has ended many producers and Manuel doesn't want to be one of them.

For this reason, he asks for a loan to purchase a cow to increase his production and to purchase pigs to have a complementary business to generate resources.

loans.use: to purchase a cow to increase his production and purchase pigs to have a complementary business.

loans.name: Gladis Mabel

texts.es:
Gladis es una mujer soltera, cabeza de familia de 35 años de edad la cual se dedica a vender mercancía, en un almacén que montó en el año 2010, con el cual ha generado el sustento para su familia.
Su negocio nace de la necesidad, en ese momento su hija tenía 1 año de edad y necesitaba un negocio donde pudiera estar cerca de ella y generar recursos.
Hoy en día ha sido una de las mejores cosas que le ha pasado en la vida, puesto que ha encontrado una regularidad financiera y aspira a aumentar sus ventas para pagar los estudios de su hija, las cuentas del hogar y en general mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y su familia.
Gladis en el momento se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para tenerr un servicio de fotocopias en su negocio, comprara una impresora láser y un surtido de productos de la temporada escolar.
texts.en:
Gladis is a single woman, a 35-year-old head of household who works selling merchandise in a store which she established in the year 2010, with which she has generated the sustenance for her family.

Her business was born of necessity, at that time she had a 1-year-old daughter and needed a business where she could be near her and generate resources.

These days, it has been one of the best things that have happened in her life since she has found a financial consistency and aspires to increase her sales to pay for her daughter's education, the household bills, and in general improve the quality of life for herself and her family.

At the moment, Gladis is asking for a loan to have a copy service in her business, she will purchase a laser printer and an assortment of products for the school season.

loans.use: to purchase a copier, a laser printer, and an assortment of supplies for the school season.

loans.name: Fredie

texts.en:
Fredie is a farmer and a married man who lives in San Juan Pana-on, a village where the main livelihood is farming. His wife is the one who takes good care of their children.

Fredie needs to work hard because his wife and 4 children depend on him. He has a vegetable garden and this helps him earn an income to provide the needs of the family. He sells the harvest from his garden. It’s already 15 years since he started operating the said business.

Now, he plans to make a bigger garden to plant more vegetables and have better earnings. He went to GDMPC and re-applied for a loan amounting to Php 7,000 to be used for paying labor costs and to buy fertilizers.

Fredie has a dream of having his own land to be used for a bigger garden in order for him to continue to send his children to school.

loans.use: to pay labor costs and to buy fertilizer for his garden.

loans.name: Clara Eugenia

texts.es:
Clara es una mujer de 53 años de edad que se dedica a vender insumos de confección.
Ella es separada, tiene una hija de 20 años de edad, con su negocio genera el sustento para la alimentación de ambas y apoya en el pago de estudios de su amada hija quien le colabora incondicionalmente en la casa y en el negocio.
Clara ha estado construyendo un negocio firme, con clientes fijos, para perdurar en el tiempo pues su objetivo es dejarle dicho negocio a su hija.
Clara quiere aumentar sus clientes, incrementar la utilidad y la producción en su negocio, por ello solicita un préstamo para comprar una máquina devanadora de 2 puestos para producir madejas de hilo.
texts.en:
Clara is a 53-year-old woman who works selling sewing supplies.

She is separated, has a 20-year-old daughter, and with her business generates the sustenance to feed both of them and support in paying for her beloved daughter's education, who helps her unconditionally in the home and the business.

Clara has been building a strong business with regular customers to last in time since her objective is to leave this business to her daughter.

Clara wants to increase her customers, increase the profit and the production of her business, so she ass for a loan to purchase a two-spool winding machine to produce spools of thread.

loans.use: to purchase a 2-spool winding machine to produce spools of thread.

loans.name: Jenny-Vi

texts.en:
Jenny-Vi is 30 years old and married with two children. With both of the children in school, Jenny-Vi works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell, like canned goods, beverages, junk foods, home care products and other groceries.

Jenny-Vi has been in this business for 2 years and sells a variety of items. In the future, Jenny-Vi would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell, like canned goods, beverages, junk foods, home care products and other groceries.

loans.name: Carlos Albeiro

texts.es:
Carlos Alberto es un hombre de 40 años de edad, el cual se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para comprar un completo surtido de ropa, productos para el hogar, alumbrados navideños, calzado con el cual abastecerá su negocio para atender la demanda de fin de año.
Es un hombre honesto, trabajador, que con perseverancia y honestidad busca sacar adelante su familia.
texts.en: Carlos Alberto, 40, is applying for a loan to buy a complete assortment of clothing, household products, Christmas lights, and footwear. He will stock his business accordingly to meet the year-end demand. He is an honest, hardworking man who seeks to get his family ahead through perseverance and honesty.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of clothing, household products, Christmas lights, and footwear.

loans.name: Hazem

texts.en:
Hazem is a 22-year-old single man who lives in Salheye. He is studying toward his bachelor degree, now in his second year.

Hazem`s future plan is to take his degrees and work in the same field. He is applying for a loan to help him to cover his semester fees and achieve his dreams.

loans.use: to cover his semester fees.

loans.name: Lâm

texts.en:
Mrs Lâm is 49 years old and she is married. She has operated a food stall/restaurant selling fish for more than 10 years. Lâm lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

Her family is a low-income household in her village; moreover, this region often suffers from natural disasters such as floods and drought.

Her family has a latrine but not hygienic. One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is the latrine is not hygienic. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a hygienic toilet.

In 2012, Lâm joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. She has successfully repaid 3 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

With her business profit, Lâm hopes for her business to do well, to travel internationally for vacations, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, bricks and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Hợi

texts.en:
Mrs Hợi is 32 years old and she is married. She has had a retail business selling dry food and general things for 6 years.

Hợi lives in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village; moreover, the market need is low in this region.

Her family has a latrine but it is not hygienic. One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is that the latrine is not hygienic. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a hygienic toilet. This is Hợi's first loan with the Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

With her business profit, Hợi hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Gloria Isabel

texts.es:
Gloria es una persona encargada de trabajar para sostener su hogar, ella es madre soltera, en la actualidad vive con su madre y una hija de cinco años de edad, los únicos ingresos que ella posee son los que genera al vender frutas y productos de la canasta básica, ya tiene más de cuatro años de estar desarrollando estás actividades por lo que cuenta con mucha popularidad.
El capital le permitirá comprar más mercadería como: fruta, arroz, jugos, pastas cereales, huevos, etc., para atender las necesidades que sus clientes tengan, espera aumentar su clientela, brindar un buen servicio y tener ingresos más estables para resarcir la deuda.
Las aspiraciones que Gloria tiene son ser reconocida como una mujer emprendedora, tener la capacidad económica  para disminuir las necesidades existentes en su hogar y apoyar a su hija para que se pueda superar académicamente.
texts.en:
Gloria is a person in charge of working to sustain her household. She is a single mother, currently she lives with her mother and a 5-year-old daughter. The only income that she has is that which she generates from selling fruit and basic pantry items, she has more than four years of developing these businesses so she is very popular.

The capital will allow her to purchase more merchandise such as fruit, rice, juices, pastas, grains, eggs, etc., to serve the needs that her customers have, she hopes to increase her customer base, offer good service and have more stable income to pay off her debt.

The aspirations that Gloria have are to be well-known as an enterprising woman, to have the economic capacity to reduce the existing needs in her household and to support her daughter so she can achieve academically.

loans.use: to purchase more merchandise such as fruit, rice, juices, pastas, grains, eggs, etc. to serve the needs that her customers have.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El señor es un padre de familia y único sustento de su hogar. Sufre de fuertes dolores dentales debido a una serie de caries que nunca se trato y actualmente tiene una fuerte infección por lo que necesita empezar un tratamiento correctivo, desgraciadamente no cuenta con los recursos suficientes para solventar el gasto.
texts.en:
He is a father and the sole support of his household. He suffers from severe dental pain due to a series of cavities that were never treated. He currently has a severe infection, and he needs to start corrective treatment.

Unfortunately, he does not have enough resources to cover the expense.

loans.use: to pay for dental treatment.

loans.name: Nelson Esau

texts.es:
Nelson es un hombre soltero, nadie depende económicamente de él, su negocio consiste en administrar una tienda de productos básicos para uso domésticos, su negocio nació por la necesidad de tener una fuente generadora de ingresos y así salir adelante, actualmente es empleado, el negocio lo atienden sus padres de siete de la mañana a cuatro de la tarde, por el momento no representa dificultades en su negocio. La foto fue tomada en su lugar de trabajo.
Comprará pan, galletas, bebidas, cereales, pasta, jabón, detergentes, etc., para tener un buen inventario que supla las necesidades de su familia, el financiamiento le será de utilidad para tener un negocio más fortalecido y que además le dará la oportunidad de aumentar sus ventas y ganancias.
Lo objetivos de Nelson son tener una clientela más grande y cambiar su estilo de vida por uno más digno.
texts.en:
Nelson is a single man, no one depends on him economically, his business consists of running a store of basic products for household use, his business was born of the necessity to have a source of income and, so, to get ahead. Currently he is employed, his parents run the business from seven in the morning to four in the afternoon, at the moment there are no difficulties in his business. The photo was taken in his workplace.

He will purchase bread, cookies, drinks, grains, pasta, soap, detergents, etc. to have a good inventory which will supply his family's needs, the loan will be useful to have a stronger business and, that in addition, will give him the opportunity to increase his sales and earnings.

Nelson's objectives are to have a larger customer base and replace his lifestyle with one that is more dignified.

loans.use: to purchase bread, cookies, drinks, grains, pasta, soap, detergents, etc. to have a good inventory which will supply his family's needs.

loans.name: Uriel Jose

texts.es:
Uriel es un joven de 26 años de edad que se encuentra solicitando su primer préstamo comercial, la razón es que desea impulsar su negocio de venta de carne, con la cual genera el sustento para su pareja con quien vive en unión libre y para su hijo de 2 años de edad.
El uso del préstamo será para la compra de cerdos los cuales procesara y venderá su carne, quiere tener surtido suficiente para atender la demanda de fin de año.
texts.en:
Uriel is a young man, 26 years old, who is asking for his first business loan, the reason is his desire to boost his business selling meat, with which he generates the sustenance for his partner, with whom he lives in common-law-marriage, and his 2-year-old son.

The use of the loan will be to purchase pigs that he will process and will sell the meat, he wants to have sufficient stock to meet the end of the year demand.

loans.use: to purchase pigs which he will process and sell the meat.

loans.name: Thủy

texts.en:
Mrs Thủy is 35 years old and she is married. She has worked in agriculture, raising poultry for more than 10 years.

She lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Her family is a low-income household in the village; moreover, this region often suffers from natural disasters such as floods and drought. Her family has a latrine but it is not hygienic.

One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is that the latrine is not hygienic. She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

In 2010, Thủy joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. Thủy has successfully repaid 3 loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

With her business profit, Thủy hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement, brick and equipment to build a toilet.

loans.name: Caridad

texts.en:
Caridad is 55 years old, married, and has seven children. She is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. Caridad has been in this business for 20 years now, and has borrowed 10 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds, vitamins and other supplies to raise her livestock. In the future, Caridad would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds, vitamins and other supplies to raise her livestock.

loans.name: Nelver Luis

texts.es:
Nelver es un joven de 23 años de edad el cual vive en unión libre con su pareja, debido a la falta de oportunidades laborales, montó un negocio de venta de carne el cual opera desde su hogar.
Never quiere tener un gran negocio, una carnicería consolidad y visitada diariamente por muchos clientes, la falta de recursos ha sido el principal impedimento de crecimiento de este empresario, pero no se rinde, está convencido de salir adelante y no tiene de otra, puesto que su negocio representan el 100% de ingresos financieros en su hogar.
El cliente solicita un préstamo para la compra de cerdos, pescado y res, con los cuales abastecerá su negocio y podrá atender la demanda de fin de año, esperando tener buenos ingresos para reinvertir en su negocio y empezar el año 2016 de la mejor manera.
texts.en:
Nelver is a young man, 23 years old, who lives in a common-law marriage with his partner. Due to the lack of job opportunities, he established a business selling meat which he operates from his home.

Nelver wants to have a big business, a strong butcher shop visited daily by many customers. The lack of resources has been the primary impediment to growth for this businessman, but he doesn't give up. He is determined to get ahead and doesn't have anything else, so his business represents 100% of the income for his household.

The client asks for a loan to purchase pigs, fish and beef, with which he will stock his business and be able to meet the end of the year demand, hoping to have good income to reinvest in his business and begin the year 2016 in a better way.

loans.use: to purchase pigs, fish, and beef with which he will stock his business.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 46 years old and married with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She has a general store business in the Philippines and has been in this business for nine years.

Gina requested a PHP 29,500 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more items, like sardines, noodles, sugar and other groceries.

In the future, she would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items, like sardines, noodles, sugar and other groceries.

loans.name: Jose Fernando

texts.es:
José es un joven de 21 años de edad, vive en un municipio de inclusión social, es una persona emprendedora y luchadora que con su empresa de producción de materiales para la construcción (ladrillo),  genera los recursos para mantener a su familia que la conforma su pareja con la que vive en unión libre y su hermosa hija de tan solo 10 meses de edad.
Expandir su local, tener sostenibilidad en su negocio, aumentar su producción son los objetivos principales en término de empresa, pero pagar la educación de sus hijos, comprar una vivienda y mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda son sus sueños para su familia.
José quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de cemento y mejora de la caseta para aumentar su producción de ladrillos.
texts.en:
José is a young man, 21 years old, who lives in a social inclusion municipality. He is an enterprising
and determined person who, with his business making construction materials (bricks), generates the resources to support his family which is made up of his partner, with whom he lives in common-law marriage, and his lovely daughter only 10 months old.

To expand his retail space, have sustainability in his business, and increase his production are the principle objectives in terms of the business, but to pay for his children's education, purchase a house and improve his housing conditions are his dreams for his family.

José wants to ask for a loan to purchase cement and improve the stall to increase his brick production.

loans.use: to purchase cement and improve the space to increase his brick production.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Ella es una joven madre de familia la cual trabaja para apoyar a la economía familiar. Tiene problemas en sus muelas de juicio por lo que necesita unas cirugías urgentes, desafortunadamente sus ingresos son insuficientes para solventar el tratamiento.
texts.en:
She is a young mother who works in order to contribute to the family finances. She has problems with her wisdom teeth. That is why she needs surgery urgently.

Unfortunately, she does not have enough income to pay for the treatment.

loans.use: to pay for dental treatment.

loans.name: Rodella

texts.en:
Rodella is 65 years old and married with four children. She earns a living by raising livestock in the Philippines.

Rodella is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to purchase feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock.

She has been raising livestock for 15 years and also earns additional income from a general store.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and other supplies to raise her livestock

loans.name: Jose Balbino

texts.es:
José, se acerca nuevamente a Padecomsm para solicitar un financiamiento, ya que la institución le da facilidad de pago, lo destinará a la compra de insumos agrícolas y pago de mozos para limpiar el terreno en el que cultivara granos básicos, espera seguir teniendo buenos resultados como en el crédito anterior.
Con la ayuda de créditos pudo recolectar la cosecha anterior y tener a tiempo los granos que comercializa y utiliza para alimentar a su familia, sus ingresos han tenido una mejoría, cuenta con más clientes satisfechos y brinda un estilo de vida más digno a su familia.
texts.en:
José is approaching Padecomsm again to ask for a loan as the institution offers easy repayment terms. He will buy agricultural supplies and pay the workers for cleaning the land where he grows basic grains. He expects to have good results as he did with the last loan.

With the help of the loans he was able to gather the previous crop having the time to sell the grains and to use for feeding his family. His income has improved with more satisfied customers and he gives his family a more dignified lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and pay the workers for cleaning the land where he grows basic grains

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is a woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Susan is 55 years old and has one child currently in school.

She has a rental van business in the Philippines. Susan requested a PHP 29,500 loan amount through NWTF to buy spare parts and other supplies for the maintenance of her business.

Susan has been in this business for 7 years. In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and other supplies for the maintenance of her business.

loans.name: Yuly Mey

texts.es:
Yuli es una empresaria de 29 años de edad, es casada y tiene dos hijos de 1 y 7, se dedica a prestar servicios de salón de belleza a domicilios pero también atiende en casa.
Ella trabaja 12 horas diarias, de lunes a domingo, se esmera tanto en su trabajo solo por el deseo de querer sacar adelante a su familia, para ello necesita recursos para comprar insumos y enseres para aumentar su profesión y tener más servicios.
Con la intención de aumentar sus servicios y abastecerse para atender la demanda de fin de año, la señora Yuli solicita un préstamo para comprar productos para lisado de pelo, gel, cosméticos, productos para realizar manicura y pedicura entre otros.
texts.en:
Yuli is a 29 year old businesswoman. She has two children, ages one and seven. She provides home beauty salon services, and she also does this at her house. She works 12 hours a day on Mondays through Sundays. She puts so much effort into her work only because she wishes to get her family ahead. In order to do so, she needs resources to buy supplies and items to expand her profession and to have more services.

In order to expand her services and to stock up in order to tend to the end of the year demand, Yuli is requesting a loan to buy hair straightening products, gel, cosmetics, manicure and pedicure products, and others.

loans.use: to buy hair straightening products, gel, cosmetics, products for manicures and pedicures, and others.

loans.name: Bernardo

texts.es:
Bernardo es un hombre de 61 años de edad, veterano de mil batallas el cual ha sobrevivo y sacado a su familia adelante con un negocio de cría de cerdos un negocio de que inicio en el año 2000, por la necesidad económica ante la imposibilidad conseguir empleo, pero su perseverancia y su sentido de responsabilidad por su familia le llevo a empezar dicho negocio y hasta el momento se siente orgulloso de que a su familia no pase necesidades.
Pensando en la temporada de fin de año, el señor Bernardo solicita un préstamo para comprar lechones y así atender la demanda de fin de año que es la más alta.
texts.en:
Bernardo, 61, is a veteran of many battles that he has survived while getting his family ahead. He works raising pigs, a business that he started in the year 2000 out of financial need and the lack of employment opportunities. His perseverance and sense of responsibility towards his family guided him, and so far he feels proud that his family needs have not gone unmet.

Looking forward to the year-end season, Bernardo is applying for a loan to buy suckling pigs so he can meet the higher demand, which is highest at year-end.

loans.use: to buy suckling pigs in order to meet the higher year-end demand.

loans.name: Deyanira

texts.es:
Deyanira es una confeccionista de 51 años de edad la cual cuenta con 4 empleados, es una mujer muy aplicada y centrada en su trabajo, su propósito es seguir progresando y afianzarse en el mercado, generando empleo principalmente a madres cabeza de familia.
El propósito central, es trabajar para mejorar sus condiciones de vida, generar empleo y motivar a sus empleadas a emprendimiento y a su desarrollo empresarial.
Deyanira siempre se ha caracterizado por ser una mujer muy recursiva que sale a las calles a conseguir clientes ye sto ha tenido buenos efectos, puesto gracias a su excelente gestión, se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para la compra de maquinaria e insumos para dar abasto a la demanda de trabajo que tiene actualmente, aumentando sus ingresos y teniendo la posibilidad de generar más empleo.
texts.en:
Deyanira is a seamstress, 51 years old, who has 4 employees. She is a very diligent woman focused on her work. Her goal is to continue progressing and secure herself in the market, generating employment primarily for female heads of household.

The central goal is to work to improve her living conditions, generate employment, and motivate her employees to undertake things and their business development.

Deyanira has always been characterized as being a very recursive person who goes out in the streets to get customers and this has had good effects since, thanks to her excellent management, she is asking for a loan to purchase machinery and supplies to meet the demand of work that she currently has, increasing her income and having the possibility of generating more employment.

loans.use: to purchase the machinery and supplies to meet the work demands that she has currently.

loans.name: Imaculada

texts.en:
Imaculada lives in Atsabe, and most of her daily income is from selling cows. She is now applying for a loan of $1,000 to improve her business.

Imaculada started her business a few years ago with her own working capital. With her husband, she was going to add money to their principal amount to buy another cow, to improve their business, because it has become their main activity.

She is happy with the loan that was offered from Tuba Rai Metin for her to have more working capital to buy more cows in the future. She wants to practice good management with this loan.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Mahammad

texts.en:
Mahammad is 24 years old and he is a refugee from the Bilasuvar region. He is married and has 1 son and 1 daughter. His family is large because he also supports his old parents and his younger siblings. He is a very hard-working person in the family.

Mahammad is a diligent person. He is trying to earn enough income by being a farmer who raises cattle and sheep. This is the way he takes care of the family's needs. He is very energetic and passionate about his job.

There are many people in the local market who respect Mahammad for his dedication, honesty and right principles when doing business. He is a well known farmer who does a great job in meeting customers' needs.

He has a small shop where he brings natural meat to sell in the market. In the local market there aren't many people who can provide the real natural meat. That's why people like buying from Mahammad.

Due to the growing demand in the market, because of peoples' preference for traditional food, like kufta and bozbash, which consist of mutton and beef, he is planning to expand. Currently he needs a 1,200 AZN loan to buy 3 calves. Hopefully KIVA lenders will support him.

loans.use: to buy 3 calves.

loans.name: Nairobis

texts.es:
Nairobis es una joven de 22 años de edad que vive en unión libre con su pareja, es muchacha humilde, sencilla, sonriente, honesta la cual se dedica a las actividades agrícolas con lo cual genera los recursos complementarios para el mantenimiento del hogar.
El cliente trabaja por mejorar sus condiciones de vida, aspirar a un mejor futuro, no pasar necesidades, poder estudiar, sueños que espera cumplir con el pasar del tiempo.
Solicita un préstamo para comprar 2 cerdos para engordar, espera venderlos muy bien en el mes de diciembre.
texts.en:
Nairobis, age 22, lives with her common-law husband. She is humble, straightforward, smiling, and honest. She is engaged in agricultural activities, which generate additional resources for the maintenance of her household.

She works in order to improve her living conditions, to aspire to a better future, to not be in need, and to be able to go to school. These are dreams that she hopes to fulfill in time.

She is requesting a loan to buy two pigs to fatten. She hopes to sell them very well in the month of December.

loans.use: to buy two pigs to fatten, and she hopes they sell very well in the month of December.

loans.name: Esther Julia

texts.es:
Esther es una mujer de 58 años de edad la cual solicita un préstamo para iniciar un negocio de venta de comidas rápidas, la decisión nace de la necesidad de generar recursos para su hogar, cada día los precios suben y un simple salario no es suficiente para mantener un hogar.
Es por esta razón que Esther acude ante la comunidad Kiva para solicitar un apoyo con el cual comprará un carro de comidas rápidas, enseres, activos y surtido de insumos para iniciar la venta de alimentos.
texts.en:
Esther, age 58, is requesting a loan to start a business selling fast food. The decision comes from the need to generate resources for her household. Every day the prices rise, and a simple salary is not enough to support a household.

It is for this reason that Esther turns to the Kiva community to request support. She will use the loan to buy a fast food cart, utensils, assets, and a stock of supplies in order to start selling food.

loans.use: to buy a fast food cart, utensils, assets, and a stock of supplies.

loans.name: Dovlat

texts.en:
Dovlat is a 19-year-old young man. He is an IDP who lives at the moment in Bilasuvar region, which is a settlement for refugee people.

Dovlat is single. His family isn't large. He helps his family and takes care of his old parents. He is supporting his family through farming activities. He is a well reputed man in the local market. At this young age, he has been successful in the local bazaar.

He grows some vegetables and fruits. People see him as an honest, intelligent and hard-working man. Dovlat's job depends on people who have high demand for fresh natural fruits and vegetables.

There are many traditional dishes which consist of vegetables, like potato, cabbage, tomato and also eggplant. People prepare dolmas, bozbash and other meals with them.

Dovlat is a very hard-working and energetic person. He wants to become successful and to meet the family's needs in a better way. To do this he plans to improve his business. He is planning to buy new seeds and fertilizers. He requires a 1,200 AZN loan. KIVA lenders should support him.

loans.use: to buy new seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 24 years old, married, and has four children, two of whom are currently in school.

Marilyn is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Marilyn requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Marilyn has been raising pigs for 3 years now, and has borrowed from NWTF 7 times in the past to sustain it.

In the future, Marilyn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 46 years old and widowed.

Gina has a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy additional groceries to sell.

Gina has been in this business for eight years and sells a variety of items such as soap, canned goods, school supplies and other groceries. 

In the future, Gina would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Jose Roberto

texts.es:
José, agradece que se le otorgara el crédito anterior, pues así pudo tener a su alcance los recursos necesarios para desarrollar sus actividades agrícolas, su situación económica no ha cambiado mucho puesto que su negocio es de subsistencia, su familia se mantiene y hoy en día conservan buena salud.
Para poder llevar a cabo la siembra de la nueva temporada y por el buen servicio que recibe, opta por seguir trabajando con créditos en Padecomsm, en esta ocasión le servirá para pagar los gastos de recolección de la cosecha de granos básicos, así podrá entregar a tiempo los pedidos que le han hecho  sus clientes y el resto lo piensa almacenar para alimentar a su familia.
texts.en:
José is grateful for the previous loan because it meant he was able to have resources on hand to develop his agricultural activities. His financial situation hasn't changed much because his business is for subsistence. His family is supported and today they are in good health.

In order to plant for the new season because of the good service he receives, he is opting to continue working with loans from Padecomsm. On this occasion it will be used to pay for expenses to harvest basic grains. This way, he will be able to deliver his orders to his customers on time and he plans on storing the rest to feed his family.

loans.use: to pay for expenses of harvesting basic grains.

loans.name: Bano

texts.en:
Like many women, it was financial constraints that played a potent factor in encouraging Bano to approach Kashf Foundation in search of a loan. Bano is a 34-year-old married woman and a mother of 4 children.

In order to support her husband's taking care of the family, she began the business of milk selling. She is known in her town for providing good quality milk. She owns buffaloes for milking. She is happily supporting her family with the income generated.

Bano has requested a Murabaha loan of 15,000 PKR to purchase another buffalo to inflate her sales, thus generating more income to cover her daily expenses.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo to inflate her sales in order to generate more income to cover her daily expenses.

loans.name: Rasheeda

texts.en:
Rasheeda is a hard working lady. She is a 45-year-old married woman. She started her business selling milk because it was difficult to maintain the household with just her husband's small income (he is also shown in the photo).

Rasheeda has buffaloes and cows for milk production; her husband sells the milk in nearby areas. Rasheeda’s job is to look after the buffaloes and collect the milk from them.

Together, both husband and wife are supporting their family. However, they need to earn more income for their everyday expenditures. Therefore, Rasheeda has requested a Murabaha loan of 30,000 PKR to buy one more buffalo to cater to more customers in order to provide her family with a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy one more buffalo to cater to more customers in order to provide her family with a better standard of living

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es:
Ella es Sandra, es una mujer de 39 años de edad la cual en busca de la libertad financiera inició una venta de mercancía por catálogo, una actividad que le representa ingresos con los cuales ha ayudado a mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia conformada por su pareja con quien vive en unión libre y sus dos hijos de 15 y 13 años de edad.
Para aprovechar la temporada de diciembre, la señora Sandra solicita un préstamo para abastecerse de ropa, accesorios y cosméticos para atender la demanda de fin de año, la cual le representa buenos ingresos, con los cuales espera darle una excelente navidad y un próspero año nuevo a su familia.
texts.en:
This is Sandra. She is 39 years old.

In order to gain financial independence, Sandra opened a business selling goods from catalogues. This has provided her with an income, which has helped her to improve her family's quality of life. Sandra has a partner and they have two children, ages 15 and 13 years old.

In order to take advantage of the high season in December, Sandra is applying for a loan in order to stock up on clothes, accessories and cosmetics and meet end-of-year demand. This will represent a good income, which she hopes to use to give her family a merry Christmas and happy new year.

loans.use: to stock up on clothes, accessories and cosmetics and meet end-of-year demand.

loans.name: Kon Wend Sita Group

texts.fr: Jacqueline est mariée sans enfants elle est âgée de 39 ans. elle gère un kiosque dans son quartier et cela fait 3 ans qu'elle exerce son cette activité. elle a besoin d'un prêt pour acheter de la boisson sucré pour 25 000 f et aussi acheter de la bière pour 75 000 f pour vendre. Le kiosque de Jacqueline est à coté d'un lycée ce qui fait la vente de ses boissons marche bien et en plus de sa elle est propre et respecte ses clients. Après ses ventes, elle aura un bénéfice qui lui permettra de faire des épargnes, de s'occuper de sa famille et aussi de continuer ses activités. elle a déjà reçu le prêt une fois et à rembourser à la date prévue à ACFIME.
texts.en:
Jacqueline is married with no children. She is 39 years old and she runs a kiosk in her area. She has been in this business for three years.

Jacqueline needs a loan to buy soft drinks for 25,000 francs and, also for resale, beer for 75,000 francs. Her business is located near a high school which makes her drinks sales do well. Moreover, she is clean and shows respect for her customers.

After her sales, she will have a profit which will permit her to put aside savings, take care of her family, and continue her business. She has already received one loan and reimbursed ACFIME on the due date.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks for 25,000 francs and beer for 75,000 francs.

loans.name: Doulama

texts.en:
Doulama is a 47-year-old Lebanese married woman living with her husband and three children, one of them still studying.

Her husband works in the car trading field, and in parallel they have a small mobile shop. As for her, Doulama does not work, she is only dedicated to her home and kids.

Today, Doulama is in need for a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to pay for her child’s school fees. It makes her very happy that she will able to secure him a brilliant future.

loans.use: to pay her child’s school fees.

loans.name: Maria Domitila

texts.es: Doña Maria de 53 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella posee desde hace 10 años una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria, 53, lives in her own house with her family group. She has owned for ten years a small store located in her home. 

She has many clients due to her good prices as well as the kindness she shows when selling. With the income from these sales, she can meet some of her household expenses.

Maria is applying for a loan to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, snacks, sweet breads, and more. She will then be able to earn better income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, snacks, sweet breads, and more.

loans.name: Leonora

texts.en:
Leonora is a married woman with six children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Leonora is 48 years old and has one child currently in school.

Leonora has a shellcraft business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional shell cover, thread and other materials needed in her business.

Leonora has been in this business for 20 years. In the future, Leonora would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional shell cover, thread, and other materials needed in her business

loans.name: Diana Cristina

texts.es:
Junto Diana se encuentra la persona que más en la vida, su hija de 4 años de edad (ver foto). Diana es una mujer que vive en unión libre con su pareja y trabaja en la venta de calzado informal el cual distribuye puerta a puerta o vende por catálogo.
Inició este trabajo por necesidad económica, tener una hija es lo mejor que le ha ocurrido pero es un compromiso grande, tanto emocional como financiero y gracias a su negocio la calidad de vida en su hogar ha aumentado y se permiten soñar con un mejor futuro, con estudio, con vivienda propia, etc.
Debido a la temporada de fin de año la señora Diana solicita un préstamo para abastecerse de calzado y así promocionar su producto, sacando el máximo provecho de la temporada y esperando ganar clientes fieles para el año 2016.
texts.en:
Junto Diana is with the person whom she loves the most in life, her four year old daughter (see photo). Diana is a woman who is in a common law marriage. She sells informal shoes which she distributes door to door and by catalog. She started this work out of financial need. Having a daughter is the best thing that has happened to her, but it is a gig commitment, both emotionally and financially. Thanks to her business the quality of life in her home has improved and they allow themselves to dream of a better future with education, with their own home, etc.

Due to the end of the year season, Diana is asking for a loan to stock up on shoes and promote her product so that she can make the most of the season. She hopes to gain loyal customers for 2016.

loans.use: to stock up on shoes and promote her product, making the most of the season.

loans.name: Olga Del Socorro

texts.es:
3 hijos mayores de edad, un sueño incumplido de comprar una vivienda, la motivación de saber que trabaja para obtener su libertad financiera, son los motivos que impulsan a la señora Olga a levantarse cada día a trabajar en su negocio de tienda de abarrotes que surgió de la necesidad.
Con el firme propósito de cumplir aquellos sueños interrumpidos en el pasado la señora Olga solicita un préstamo para comprar un completo surtido de abarrotes, víveres, refrescos, cervezas para atender la demanda que se presenta en la temporada de fin de año.
texts.en:
Three adult children; the thus far unfulfilled dream of buying a home; knowing that she is working to achieve financial independence. It is these things that motivate Olga to get up every day to work in her grocery store.

Olga opened this grocery store because she needed to do so. Now, with the aim of achieving unfulfilled dreams, Olga is applying for a loan in order to stock up on groceries, supplies, soft drinks and beers and thus meet end-of-year demand.

loans.use: to stock up on groceries, supplies, soft drinks and beers and thus meet end-of-year demand.

loans.name: Nyota Group

texts.fr: Mubembe est un personnel soignant mais il exerce aussi la riziculture car il est issu d'une famille de cultivateurs. Assistée par son épouse Bora, cette activité intervient beaucoup plus à l'alimentation de la famille et à répondre aux besoins primaires pour ne pas espérer seulement au salaire. Comme difficulté, l'insuffisance de fonds constitue un obstacle pour concrétiser les travaux déjà commencés. Pour Mubembe, parvenir à cultiver un hectare prétendra moissonner une quantité plus grande qui leur permettra d'améliorer leurs conditions de vie et scolariser leurs quatre enfants jusqu'à l'université car le salaire à lui seul ne peut couvrir toutes ces charges.
texts.en:
Mubembe is a caregiver, but he also grows rice because he comes from a farming family. He is helped by his wife Bora. This farming business is very useful for feeding the family, and also for their basic needs, so that he doesn't depend only on his salary. He has difficulty with insufficient working capital to achieve what is needed and has already been begun

For Mubembe, managing to farm one hectare should allow him to harvest a sufficient quantity to improve his family's living conditions and put their four children in school up to university level, things his salary alone will not allow him to cover.

loans.use: to transplant the rice shoots, weed them, and buy fertilizer and other chemicals to make the plants grow healthily.

loans.name: Marquita

texts.en:
Marquita has been involved in business activities since 2014 when she started out with her own working capital of $600. She has a kiosk in front of her house.

She is using the loan of $1000 from Tuba Rai Metin to buy additional supplies, including detergents, cooking oils, water, cigarettes, nuts, candles, hand and body products, noodles, soaps, soft drinks, hard drinks and other things to sell.

She was very happy when the Tuba Rai Metin offered the loan to her because she can use this loan to improve her business and her income can increase.

loans.use: To buy detergents, cooking oils, water, cigarettes, nuts, candles, hand and body products, noodles, soaps, soft drinks, hard drinks and other things to sell.

loans.name: Jaha

texts.en:
Jaha lives in a southern part of Kosovo. He is a father of 2 children, ages 1 and 4 years old.

For more than four years he has been running his own cafe bar. In his village, cafe bars are rare, which enables him to have more profit. Usually his customers are the younger generation who have a good time drinking coffee.

Jaha is now requesting a loan in order to add a table for billiards and to renovate his cafe shop in order to satisfy his customers' demands and expectations.

He is very ambitious and enjoys working a lot and very hard. By doing this, he will be able to continue to serve his current clients and get repeat business as well as new clients.

loans.use: to purchase a table for billiards and to renovate his cafe shop in order to satisfy and attract customers.

loans.name: Oktay

texts.en:
Oktay is a 20-year-old IDP from the Bilasuvar region. He is single and living with his family; he has 1 brother and 2 sisters. He likes to help his old retired mother and father who are living together in a refugee settlement.

He grows some vegetables and fruits in the yard. He loves this job. Oktay, with the support of his family and his wife especially, is running quite a successful farming business. His wife is a school teacher but helps him with great passion. He has more than 5 years of experience. To manage the farm, he relies on his children's support as well: they help him with watering, cleaning the yard, and other related tasks. They support each other very well.

Oktay is running the farm with great passion and love because he wants to take care of his family. Oktay sells the natural fruits and vegetables in the local market. In Azerbaijan, there is a great demand for vegetables to make traditional foods like dolma, bozbash and also the fruits for after dinner deserts. He is currently planning to expand the business. He requires 1,200 AZN to buy new fruit trees and fertilizers for the vegetables. He hopes that Kiva lenders will support him.

loans.use: to buy new fruit trees and fertilizers for the vegetables

loans.name: Nicanie

texts.en:
Nicanie is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell like canned goods, detergent, coffee, sugar, eggs, etc. for her general store business.

Nicanie has been in this business for 3 years. Nicanie earns more income from raising livestock.

Nicanie has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell, like canned goods, detergent, coffee, sugar, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Melonita

texts.en:
Melonita is 44 years old and has three children. Melonita is married and her three children are in school.

Melonita is in the agricultural business, fattening pigs in the Philippines. Melonita requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Melonita has been in pig fattening for four years now, and she has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Melonita would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Catalina

texts.en:
Catalina works hard to support her family. Catalina is married and has a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Catalina requested a 16,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs. Catalina has been in this business for four years now.

Catalina would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Ma. Filipinas

texts.en:
As a married parent of nine children, Ma. Filipinas works hard to support her family. She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food processing. Ma. Filipinas is borrowing 10,000 PHP through NWTF to  buy additional boxes of fish to sell in her fish vending business.

Ma. Filipinas has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Yuribel Del Carmen

texts.es:
Yuribel es una joven cabeza de familia de 23 años de edad, tiene una hija de tan solo 7 meses de edad, emprendedora, trabajadora, alegre, una mujer que quiere salir adelante, brindarle calidad de vida a su hija y un buen futuro.
Aunque no contó con oportunidades laborales, las ganas de trabajar de esta joven la llevo a generarse sus propias oportunidades, inició con un negocio de salón de belleza, empezó con un bajo capital, pero a medida que ganaba dinero iba comprando activos para su negocio y hoy en día tiene lo que ven en la foto.
Yurible quiere seguir progresando y contar con una excelente infraestructura para atender la temporada de fin de año. Solicita un préstamo para comprar una lava-cabezas, sala de espera y productos de tratamientos y capilares.
texts.en:
Yuribel is 23 year old head of household with a daughter who is just seven months old. She is enterprising, hardworking, and cheerful, a woman who wants to get ahead and offer her daughter a good quality of life and future.

Although she didn't have good work opportunities, this young woman's eagerness to work led to her generating her own opportunities. She started her own beauty salon business. She began with a little capital, but as she earned money, she would buy assets for her business and today it looks like it does in the photo.

Yurible wants to continue with her progress and have excellent infrastructure for the end of the year season. She is asking for a loan to buy a hair washer sink, items for her waiting room and hair treatment products.

loans.use: to buy a hair washing sink, items for her waiting room and hair treatment products.

loans.name: Khaled

texts.en:
Khaled believes that the certificate is the only weapon in this world. He is 22 years old, and a university student majoring computer information systems, and also he is working in a restaurant besides his education.

He is an example of a guy who will not stop trying to achieve his dreams, and he wants to become a successful and important person in the future. That man is Khaled, a guy who is ambitious and a hard worker.

Khaled wants to complete his studies, but his family is facing financial problems. Therefore, he applied for an educational loan to cover his university fees so that he can graduate to find good work with a good salary.

loans.use: to cover his university fees and graduate to find good work with a good salary.

loans.name: Tuendelee Riz Group

texts.fr: De son premier crédit, Jean a exécuté le sarclage, le repiquage et l'achat des engrais. Avec le petit gain réalisé, il l'a supplée dans la prise en charge de sa famille. La difficulté majeure qui l'a heurté fût le problème d'eau d'irrigation et la faible étendue exploitée. Pour ce présent crédit, il va cultiver le double de l'étendue précédente (25 ares) avec l'espoir d'atteindre une grande production et vu que le canal d'irrigation a été aussi réhabilité.
texts.en:
With his first loan, Jean executed weeding, transplanted and purchase of fertiliser. With the small profit realised, he supplemented his family's care. The major difficulty which he encountered was the problem of water irrigation and the small surface exploited.

For the current loan, he will cultivate double the previous suface (25 acres) with the hope of reaching a high production, especially as the irrigation canal was also renovated.

loans.use: to transplant, weed and buy fertiliser.

loans.name: Else Emilia

texts.en:
Good day lenders! Meet one of KPP UMKM’s clients, Else, who is a 38-year-old married woman with three sons.

Else has been selling and crediting clothes and electronic items. Her husband has been a merchant for twenty years.

She has asked for a loan of IDR 7,200,000 from KPP-UMKM Syariah. This loan will be used to build a sanitation system at their home to improve access to sanitation and a water source for their family. Her family income is insufficient to build toilets and water sources but Else will be able to repay the loan received.

She and her family want to live a healthy life with healthy sanitation and clean water. She is very grateful for the opportunity and wants to thank to all lenders.

loans.use: This loan will be used to build a sanitation system at their home to improve access to sanitation and a water source for their family.

loans.name: Cahid

texts.en:
Cahid is 24 years old. He is refugee. Cahid is living in the refugee settlement called Bilasuvar in the southern part of the country. He resides with his family, like his father and mother.

Cahid has a college education and uses this knowledge in his daily farming activities because he studied agricultural subjects.

To provide a good income for his family he is involved in agriculture. Cahid started his business 8 years ago and has good experience in it so far. He has 6 cows and 14 sheep. He raises calves, fattens them and then takes their meat to the local bazaar. He keeps these animals on his own land.

There is a significant demand for meat in Azerbaijan. People consume a lot of meat and most of the traditional dishes, like kebabs, kufta and rice, consist of meat.

Cahid has requested a loan in the amount of 1,200 AZN to buy sheep to fatten and subsequently resell. Cahid intends to channel his earnings toward developing his business and improving his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy sheep to fatten up and resell

loans.name: Latofat

texts.en:
Latofat was born in 1972. She is married and brings up four children. Latofat lives with her family in a village, and she runs an animal husbandry business.

Latofat feeds cows. She sells milk products to local people. She has additional income from gardening and she grows fruit trees. Latofat grows 70 trees. She works hard every day. Latofat’s daughter helps her to manage the business.

She is the main bread winner of her family because her husband has a small income. She is asking for a loan of 10,000 Somoni (TJS) to buy cows to increase her working capital. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to buy cows to increase her working capital.

loans.name: Maria Antonia

texts.es:
María requiere de un nuevo crédito para comprar 21 medios de semilla de marañón que luego procesará y distribuirá entre sus clientes, así aprovechara el buen precio de la temporada y sus ganancias serán mejores, tiene la esperanza de seguir trabajando sin dificultades para sacar a su grupo familiar adelante.
Con el financiamiento anterior ella ha podido aumentar la cantidad de producto que almacenaba para ir atendiendo las demandas de sus clientes, con las ganancias ha disminuido las necesidades familiares y se mantiene trabajando para construir su casa y agregar un nuevo rubro a su negocio con el que pueda tener ingresos extras.
texts.en:
Maria needs a new loan to buy 21 half measures of raw cashew nuts that she will later process and distribute to her customers. This way, she will take advantage of the season's good prices and her earnings will be better. She has hopes of continuing to work without difficulties, in order to help her family get ahead.

With the prior loan, she has been able to increase the quantity of product that she kept in stock in order to meet her customer's needs. With the earnings, she has reduced her family's needs. She keeps working to build her house and to expand her business with more products so that she can have extra income.

loans.use: to buy 21 half measures of raw cashews that she will later process and distribute to her customers.

loans.name: Majdoleen

texts.en: Majdoleen is 21 years old, and she is studying to be a teacher. In her third year she is an example of the superior girl in university. Although she faced financial difficulties, which prevented her from paying tuition,  this did not stop her from trying to achieve her dream. Majdoleen requested an educational loan to help her cover her university fees. She wants to graduate and find good work to help her increase her income and to help her family with their expenses.

loans.use: To pay for her upcoming semester fees

loans.name: Famille Nzando Group

texts.fr: Appris de ses parents, Benoît reconnaît les bienfaits de la riziculture car elle a permis aux enfants qu'ils étaient de grandir convenablement et d'étudier. Seuls le manque d'eau d'irrigation et les maladies des plantes en constituent l'obstacle mais il souhaite à la longue en finir avec la location de champ et en avoir un qui lui appartiendrait. Avec une bonne production, ils pourront, sa femme et lui, améliorer les conditions alimentaires et l'habitat de leur famille.
texts.en: Having learned from his parents,  Benoît  recognizes the benefits of rice-growing because it allowed him and his siblings to grow up appropriately and to study. The only obstacles for him are lacking irrigation water and plant diseases, but he hopes in the long run to no longer rent the field and have one that would belong to him. With good production, he and his wife would be able to improve their family's food and living conditions.

loans.use: to plow, till, and weed the fields, pay for field laborers, and buy fertilizer and plant chemicals.

loans.name: Aizada

texts.en:
Aizada is an 18-year-old freshman in the International and Comparative Politics Program at AUCA. She is applying for a Kiva loan to pay for her bachelor's degree at AUCA.

Aizada came to study at AUCA from the Talas region of Kyrgyzstan. In her village, she lives with her father, mother and sisters - one older and one younger. Her family members are ordinary farmers: they rent land and grow beans, potatoes, corn, etc. Like any farmer's destiny, their income depends on good weather and a good harvest, since they sell the harvested crops.

In the beginning, Aizada didn’t believe that she could enter a university as prestigious as AUCA, because the entrance exams were held in English. Thanks to her good high school education, she was able to pass them and became a freshman.
 
While preparing for the exams, Aizada’s father cheered her up by saying that his daughters shouldn’t be a farmer like him, as he couldn’t provide them a good life and the promise of a bright future. He used to say that making Aizada’s life good or bad is in her hands. She can obtain success and a better life by herself, by getting a good education and trying her best in this life.

Aizada is all too thankful for her father’s advice and now hopes to continue her studies at AUCA with the help of a Kiva loan. She says that her parents’ income is just enough for her living, food and transportation expenses, but is not enough for the university fee.

loans.use: to pay for her higher education

loans.name: Leo Group

texts.fr: Dans le but de stabiliser sa famille, surtout ses enfants scolarisés, en constance mutation pour des raisons professionnelles de son époux, Solange s'est lancée dans la vente des pagnes depuis 2008. Actuellement grâce à cette activité et le nouvel emploi de son conjoint, ils sont parvenus à s'acheter une parcelle. Son seul souci est l'insuffisance de fonds qu'elle dispose car cette activité nécessite un capital important afin d'être compétitive et d'éviter le rupture de stock. Sur photo, Solange porte une blouse noire.
texts.en: In order to stabilise her family, especially her children in school, constantly moving because of her husband's professional reasons, Solange has started selling pagne (traditional cloth) since 2008. Currently, thanks to this activity and her husband's new job, they were able to purchase a lot of land. Her only concern is the lack of funds at her disposal, as this activity requires significant capital in order to be competitive and avoid stock-outs. In the picture, Solange wears a black blouse.

loans.use: to source and sell pagne (traditional cloth).

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.en:
Wilfredo is working as a driver and he needs a loan to fix the room where his mother lives. Wilfredo and his son are living at his mother s house, but she is old, so Wilfredo is supporting the entire family. Wilfredo has a little pain in his back which is because of his work, but he is not going to stop working.

He would like to buy a new vehicle in the future but right now he hopes you can help him. In the picture you can see the place where Wilfredo lives and as you can see, the place needs a lot of work and he will carry it out.

loans.use: to fix the room where his mother lives

loans.name: Ganga

texts.en:
Ganga is 38 years old. She is married and has one child, aged 18. Many years ago, she established her vegetable farming business. Working seven days a week and five hours a day, she supports her family. She has already received and successfully repaid five loans from Patan Business and Professional Women, and wants to use this new loan to buy seeds and fertilizer. In the future, She plans to uplift the economic condition of her family. She thanks you for your support.

Over 70% of Nepal's economy is agricultural. Typically, Nepali households grow crops on small plots of terraced land. Rice (bhat), lentils (daal), and vegetables (tarkari) are the staples of the Nepali diet. With a Kiva loan, BPW's borrowers are able to purchase greater amounts of seed and fertilizer. With more seeds and fertilizer, a borrower is able to grow cash crops to be sold in the local market. Such crops allow households to move beyond subsistence and provide much-needed cash income throughout the year.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Joanne

texts.en: Joanne is 36 years old married with two children. To make a living, she owns and operates for rent transportation services business. She has been engaged in her business for many years and earns well from this business aside from her salary. In 2004, Joanne joined GDMPC. Recently Joanne is requesting a loan of 6,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase spare parts and maintenance of vehicle, for better service. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business, to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and maintenance.

loans.name: Adna

texts.en:
Adna works hard to support her family. Adna is married and has a selling herbal medicines business in the Philippines.

Adna requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks of herbal medicines to sell.

Adna has been in this business for 1 year now.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Adna would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of herbal medicines to sell

loans.name: Pendeza Group

texts.fr: Mwenge est commerçante, membre de la banque villageoise «Pendeza», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, mariée, âgée de 30 ans. Elle est vendeuse des denrées alimentaires au domicile dans une avenue de la ville depuis 4 ans. Elle va s’approvisionner en neuf sacs de manioc. Elle débuta par le premier fonds reçu de sa famille. Elle souhaite augmenter l’activité. Au final, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables. Nous tenons à signaler qu'une cliente porte son bébé.
texts.en:
Mwenge is a trader, member of the "Pendeza" banc villageois, client of Hekima MFI, married and 30 years old. She has been selling foodstuffs from home, in one of the city's avenues, for four years. She is going to source nine bags of cassava.

She started with initial capital received from her family. She wishes to build her activity. In conclusion, she thanks Hekima for the support they give to financially excluded entrepreneurs. We wish to note that one client is carrying her baby.

loans.use: to source nine bags of cassava.

loans.name: Alleluya Group

texts.fr: Charlotte est commerçante, trésorière du collectif de crédits «Alleluya», cliente de l’IMF Hekima, veuve, âgée de 42 ans, mère de 8 enfants dont 7 scolarisés et 1 est grand. Elle est vendeuse de friperie dans la rue depuis 5 ans. Elle va s’approvisionner en rideaux, foulards, etc. Elle commença son business  avec le fonds reçu de son mari lors de son vivant. Elle souhaite augmenter son activité, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au final, elle remercie Hekima pour le soutien apporté aux entrepreneurs non bancables.
texts.en: Charlotte is a trader, the treasurer of the "Alleluya" credit group, client of Hekima MFI, widowed, 42 years old, the mother of eight children of whom seven go to school and one is older. She has been selling second-hand clothes in the street for five years. She will get supplies of curtains, scarves, etc. She started her business with funds received from her husband while he was alive. She wishes to grow her activity, to school and feed her children. In conclusion, she thanks Hekima for the support given to financially excluded entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to get supplies of curtains, scarves, etc.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is 23 years old. He lives in refugee’s camp called Baqaa with his family. Ahmad was working as a taxi driver to earn money to help his retired father, and at the same time he is studying for a bachelor's degree, majoring in accounting. He is in his fourth year.

He is planning to find a better job after his graduation to earn a better income in order to support his family. But because of the financial crisis his family has been facing, he wasn't able to pay for his upcoming semester fees. For this reason, he has applied for this loan, to help him pay for his university education and achieve his dreams.

loans.use: to pay for his upcoming semester fee for a BSc. in Accounting

loans.name: Somsanouk Group

texts.en: Fon’s village sources much of their drinking water from local wells, streams, and collected rainwater.  These sources of water are not safe to drink without treatment by boiling.  Fon and his group are excited that the filter was available on a payment plan that made it much more affordable.  Treating drinking water requires cash and time, which now he can shift to other pursuits.  Fon and his village also understand the impact unsafe drinking water has on their family’s budgets. The filter is guaranteed for 2 years; within this 2 years filter users, like Fon’s family, identify a substantial decrease in illness and associated medical costs.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Wafanyakazi Group

texts.fr: Les revenus issus du précédent crédit ont aidé Félix et les autres membres du groupe WAFANYAKAZI a répondre à leur devoir de parents: scolarisation des enfants, soins médicaux, alimentation, agrandissement de l'étendue cultivée et la réalisation des petits investissements. Les oiseaux ravageurs du paddy ont sollicité une garde de champ comme moyen pour les contourner.
